title: T200 Fatima Cleveland Americans w/ Joe Jackson Psa 3 SOLD

posts.post_title: T200 Fatima Cleveland Americans w/ Joe Jackson Psa 3 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hi guys. I have this card for sale. Very nice for the grade. The Psa case has a couple scratches. $SOLD delivered. Please email if interested or with any questions. Thanks, Jim.
